content: ski ll level - easy before you start crocheting an octopus materials yarn art jeans 55% cotton 45% рас - pink turquoise 2 mm crochet hook 4 eyes 1 used 5 mm attached to glue scissors and yarn needle black threads for face details marker stuffing sewed bags in advance from а piece of sock 1 put the stuffing in these bags these soft capsules are placed inside the tentacles total 8 soft capsules abbreviations magic_ring = magic_ring chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet si st = slip_stitch lnc = lncrease crochet two into same stitch half_double_crochet - half douыe crochet stitch double_crochet - douыe crochet blo = crochet through back loops only flo = crochet through front loops only in 1 = in ones single_crochet notes aii terms are us crochet work in а continuous spiral unless instructed otherwise in the pattern crochet 2 bodies yarn of different colors lf you find any errors or need help with any part of the pattern don t hesitate to message me pleasant st at one detail cut the yarn and secure the end of the thread leave the second detail with а long tail about 1 meter lt is needed for stitching details pattern ьу katia glebova 2021 assembly long tail yarn needle place one piece inside the other align the crocheted octopus pieces the tentacles should line up with each other see picture 1 one of the pieces has а long tail lnsert this tail into the needle placing the bottom of each half together sew the details in half loops pic 2 and 3 connect the tentacles with the same tail see picture 4 continue around the tentacles stuffing as you go place а filler capsule inside each tentacle see picture 5 and 6 fasten_off and weave in all ends pattern ьу katia glebova 2021 add the eyes to both of your octopus bodies attach eyes between 11th and 12th rounds 1 glued eyes use the ыасk floss thread to give а toy the desired facial expression 1 have embroidered а smile
